meanings.definition: A person who applies a silver coating to something.
meanings.sent1: The silverers carefully coated the antique mirror with a shiny layer of silver.
meanings.sent2: The silverers were skilled artisans who specialized in adding a silver finish to various objects.
meanings.sent3: The silverers joked that they were turning everything into silver treasures with their magical touch.
meanings.sent4: The silverers were like wizards, transforming ordinary items into gleaming silver wonders.
meanings.sent5: The silverers' work sparkled with the brilliance of a thousand stars, captivating all who beheld it.

meanings.definition: Those who are involved in the process of silvering.
meanings.sent1: The team of silverers worked together to ensure each piece was perfectly silvered.
meanings.sent2: The silverers collaborated to complete the silvering process efficiently and effectively.
meanings.sent3: The silverers shared stories and laughter while they meticulously silvered each item.
meanings.sent4: The silverers moved with precision and grace, like dancers performing a silvering routine.
meanings.sent5: The workshop buzzed with activity as the silverers diligently carried out their silvering tasks.

meanings.definition: The act of coating something with silver.
meanings.sent1: The silverers' silvering of the jewelry gave it a luxurious and elegant appearance.
meanings.sent2: The silverers' silvering process involved careful application of the precious metal.
meanings.sent3: The silverers' silvering of the statue made it look like a majestic silver monument.
meanings.sent4: The silverers' silvering technique was so refined, it turned objects into silver masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The silverers' silvering transformed ordinary items into extraordinary silver treasures.
